text:
For everyone attending in-person, just a reminder: The developer community meetup is NOT happening at the BCEC where INBOUND is occurring. It is occurring at the HubSpot Offices in Cambridge <https://goo.gl/maps/jprJ75r3USdyaNkb8>

The hotel shuttles will not take you there.
Taking a ride share, taxi or public transit is probably easiest, I would not advise using a rental car, streets and parking in Boston and Cambridge is a little crazy.

If you have the time, walking is also not bad but account for the time it takes to get there. We are super excited to see you all there.
